text: Ellezine yeterabbesune bikum, fe in kane lekum fethun minallahi kalu e lem nekun meakum, ve in kane lil kafirine nasibun kalu, e lem nestahviz aleykum ve nemna’kum minel mu’minin(mu’minine), fallahu yahkumu beynekum yevmel kıyameh(kıyameti) ve len yec’alallahu lil kafirine alel mu’minine sebila(sebilen)
